response.job_title: Mechanical Design Engineer l Product Designer l CAD l Investigation
response.summary:
Mechanical engineer with interpersonal skills and a team-oriented mindset, focused on achieving goals.
I have experience in machine element design, industrial manufacturing processes, and extensive knowledge of 2D and 3D CAD modeling software, as well as finite element analysis software, primarily focused on the aerospace and automotive sector. My interests lie in product planning, management, research, and machine design and development.

Portfolio: https://www.behance.net/gallery/163345147/PORTAFOLIO-ING-MECANICO

Publications:
- Analysis of the Dynamic Behavior of a Double Wishbone Independent Suspension for Vehicles (DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.22335/rlct.v11i2.641 )
response.skills: Ingeniería mecánica, Desarrollo de productos, 3D CAD, AutoCAD Mechanical, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Trabajo en equipo, Diseño de elementos de máquinas, Autodesk Inventor, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
- Develop, design, and implement relevant and necessary modifications to aeronautical component test benches, as required.
- Develop the corresponding planning and preparation (procedure, test sequence, and annexes) of tests for aeronautical components, as required.
profile_positions.title: Specialist Aerospace Testing Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Design and create manufacturing drawings for aeronautical products and tools using computer-aided design (CAD) supported by finite element software.
- Preparation of specialized engineering studies for the manufacture of aeronautical parts using Reverse Engineering.
- Structuring processes for the modification, alteration, and major repair of aeronautical products through Engineering Orders.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Proyects:
- Structural design of "Santos Power Room" (Customer: Schneider Electric - Ecopetrol)
- Structural design of "SACHA SWG-350, SWG-390, SWG 490 y SWG-410 Power Room" . (Customer Schneider Electric – Petroamazonas EP)
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Calculate mechanical transmission components such as pulleys, belts, shafts, and bearings for machines used in mineral processing plants.
- Generate 3D CAD models and manufacturing drawings for assembly.
Perform finite element analysis for engineering verification of functionality and design optimization.
- Standardize and classify machine components through programming in Autodesk Inventor's iLogic language.
profile_positions.title: Design and Developmet Professional

profile_positions.description:
- Development of basic and detailed engineering for Electrical Shelters (Shelters) and Skids used in the hydrocarbon sector.
- Perform 3D CAD modeling, drafting, and structural calculations, ventilation, and air conditioning in the design process.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Development of engineering calculations and manufacturing and assembly drawings for storage solutions in distribution centers.
- Planning of manufacturing processes associated with components (including master and detailed plans, and personnel management on-site)
-Automation of drawing processes using AutoCAD and Inventor
profile_positions.title: Design and Production Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Development of P&ID (Piping and Instrumentation Diagram) drawings. CAD modeling and assembly generation. Preparation of detailed drawings for components of a CG-25 Concrete Mixing Plant
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Designer

company.name: Fuerza Aeroespacial Colombiana
company.description:
La Fuerza Aeroespacial Colombiana tiene como misión volar, entrenar y combatir para vencer y dominar en el aire, el espacio y el ciberespacio, en defensa de la soberanía, la independencia, la integridad territorial, el orden constitucional y contribuir a los fines del Estado.

Visión: Para ejercer el dominio en el aire, el espacio y el ciberespacio, la Fuerza Aeroespacial será innovadora, polivalente, interoperable, líder y preferente regional, con alcance global y con capacidades disuasivas reales, permanentes y sostenibles.
